title: Manage Refinery Steam System
description: A utilities operator manages the refinery's steam system, ensuring there is enough high-pressure steam for process units while optimizing fuel gas consumption in the boilers.

tasks.description: Review the current steam demand from all process units and the current production from each boiler.
tasks.expected_outcome: A balance of steam supply and demand is displayed.

tasks.description: Notice that the main steam header pressure is dropping, indicating a supply/demand imbalance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator correctly identifies the developing problem.

tasks.description: Increase the firing rate on a backup boiler to bring more steam production online and stabilize the header pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The backup boiler is brought online, and the steam pressure returns to its normal operating range.
